Hold your cube such that the center colors match as follows, and input your cube\'s colors. When done with ALL SIX SIDES, hit \"Generate Solution.\"

1) Use the drop-up menu in the bottom-left to choose a color. 
2) Find the side of your cube with that center color. 
3) Align the grid with that side of the cube and take a picture of it (the camera will autofocus). 
4) Repeat steps 1-3 for the other five sides.


TIPS: 
	•		Take pictures in good lighting 
	•		Keep the lighting across pictures of all six side consistent 
	•		Try to avoid taking shaky pictures
